title: To: Riot
body:
I've been on the Rift now for many years. 

Met Hearts of Gold and shed a few Tears. 

I take to each battle like a Force of Nature,  but not always does Fate Twist in my favor. 

Like the Face of a Mountain I always persevere. 

Because even when Exhausted,  it's me they should Fear. 

Thanks for the GG's Riot!
